testcase.name: Home-Arrivals-Add to Basket-Items-Remove book
testcase.system-out: Given Initialize the browser with chrome....................................passed And Navigate to "http://practice.automationtesting.in/" Site................passed And Click on Shop Menu......................................................passed And Now click on Home menu button...........................................passed When The Home page must contain only three Arrivals.........................passed And Now click the image in the Arrivals.....................................passed And Test whether it is navigating to next page where the user can add that book into his basket..passed And Image should be clickable and should navigate to next page where user can add that book to his basket.passed And Click on the Add To Basket button which adds that book to your basket...passed And User can view that Book in the Menu item with price.....................passed And Now click on Item link which navigates to proceed to check out page.....passed And Now click on Remove this icon in Check out page which removes that book from the grid..passed Then User has the feasibility to remove the book at the time of check out also.passed
